# [FEAT] AI-suggested Responses

## Labels
`ai`, `priority:high`

## Description
Implement AI-powered response suggestions to help agents reply faster and more consistently.

## Requirements

### Response Suggestions
- AI-generated reply drafts
- Relevant macro suggestions
- Similar ticket suggestions
- Knowledge article recommendations
- Next best action suggestions

### Suggestion Sources
- Historical ticket responses
- Knowledge base articles
- Macro library
- Best performing responses
- Agent expertise patterns

### Agent Experience
- Suggestions in ticket interface
- One-click insertion
- Edit before sending
- Feedback mechanism (helpful/not)
- Suggestion preferences

### Learning & Improvement
- Learn from agent edits
- Track suggestion acceptance
- Improve over time
- Agent-specific learning
- Quality scoring

### Configuration
- Enable/disable suggestions
- Suggestion frequency
- Source prioritization
- Language settings
- Confidence thresholds

### Analytics
- Suggestion usage rates
- Time saved metrics
- Response quality impact
- Most used suggestions
- Improvement trends

## Zendesk Reference
The AI copilot presents agents with suggested responses and actions based on customer queries, summarizes conversations, surfaces similar tickets, and makes macro suggestions.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Response suggestions appear
- [ ] One-click insertion works
- [ ] Learning from feedback
- [ ] Suggestion accuracy improves
- [ ] Usage analytics available
